text:
Serving first as governor-princess of [[Aundair]] before ascending to be Queen of [[Galifar]], Marala ir'Wynarn devoted herself to strengthening the [[Arcane Congress]], but also to improving schools and universities across the united kingdom. Much of Galifar's traditions of education are the direct result of Marala's efforts, leading the people to call her the "Hand of [[Aureon]]". 

In addition to her public works, Queen Marala took great pride in her personal library, collecting tomes from across [[Eberron]]. Her library included rare texts and [[spellshard]]s from [[Aerenal]], [[Ohr Kaluun]], and even a massive codex written by a [[Cul'sir]] [[wizard]] of [[ancient|Age of Giants]] [[Xen'drik]]. The tales say that her library was hidden in an invisible tower, which modern scholars believe may have been a variant of the [[magnificent mansion]] spell. She died under mysterious circumstances, and her trove of texts wasn't accounted for in her will; it's quite possible that her extradimensional invisible tower is still out there in the ether, waiting to be found.
title: Marala ir'Wynarn
